articles.description: England goalkeeper Mary Earps wins Sports Personality of the Year and Manchester City reach Club World Cup final, plus EFL Cup quarter-final reaction.
articles.title: Earps wins SPOTY, plus Club World Cup & EFL Cup reaction

articles.description: England and Manchester United goalkeeper Mary Earps wants "to change the world" after being named Sports Personality of the Year 2023.
articles.title: Earps wants 'to change the world' after SPOTY win

articles.description: Former Wolves and Tottenham boss Nuno Espirito Santo replaces Steve Cooper as manager of Nottingham Forest.
articles.title: Forest appoint Nuno to replace sacked Cooper

articles.description: England post 267-3, their highest T20 total, to level the series with West Indies at 2-2 and set up a decider.
articles.title: England hit record 267 to level T20 series with WI

articles.description: From abandoned baby to world record holder, Fatima Whitbread's story is one of triumphing over adversity.
articles.title: 'Her will to succeed was born from her will to survive'

articles.description: Manchester City sweep past Urawa Red Diamonds to set up a meeting with South American champions Fluminense in the final of the Club World Cup on Friday.
articles.title: Man City sweep past Urawa to reach Club World Cup final

articles.description: Stephen Curry scores a game-high 33 points to guide the Golden State Warriors to a dramatic overtime win against the Boston Celtics.
articles.title: NBA: Stephen Curry top-scores for Golden State Warriors in overtime win

articles.description: A Turkish top-flight game is suspended after Istanbulspor's president withdrew his team from the pitch in protest at a refereeing decision in their match with Trabzonspor.
articles.title: Turkish top-flight team leave pitch in protest

articles.description: Nottingham Forest's sacking of manager Steve Cooper "almost feels like they couldn't wait to get rid of him" despite the "romance" they shared, former striker Glenn Murray tells BBC Radio 5 Live.
articles.title: 'Almost feels like Forest couldn't wait to get rid'

articles.description: Europe's victory over the US to regain the Ryder Cup was "fuelled" by Rory McIlroy's bust up on Saturday, captain Luke Donald tells Iain Carter.
articles.title: 'Seve spirit and Rory's wrath - Donald's Ryder Cup masterplan'
